title: Scratchbac Telegram Bot
description: Built to provide hyperlocal community building, users can provide and seek help from their neighbours, garnering 60,000 users a day.

title: Scratchbac App
description: Scratchbac eventually built their own internal system from the ground up to improve scalability and user experience. Funded sucessfully on Kickstarter, and generated international media attention.

title: Timetable Dashboard
description: Outdated and depracated technologies lead governments to unoptimized timetables and improper delegation of officers. A dynamic and modern dashboard - with a myriad of features, was the perfect solution that to mitigate these issues, saving millions of dollars annually.
